name: Lacking Numerous Control
description:
A simple endless runner game made in 24 hours for VAN Jam.

WARNING: Can cause motion sickness

The game's title and theme was randomly chosen by generating a verb, adjective and noun.

Keep the bar at the top filled by collecting pickups.

Controls:

  • Walk: WASD or Left Stick
  • Turn Left: Q or Left Shoulder Button
  • Turn Right: E or Right Shoulder Button
  • Jump: Space or A / X
  • Restart: R or Y / Triangle

Known Issues:

  • Menus only work with mouse
  • Custom fullscreen resolutions aren't borderless
  • Bad RNG can cause you to instantly die

Requires a 64bit version of Windows.
